articles.author: Andrew Webster
articles.title: Makoto Shinkai’s Suzume hits theaters in April 2023
articles.description: The next anime feature from Makoto Shinkai, the director behind Your Name and Weathering With You, is called Suzume, and it will hit theaters outside of Japan in April 2023.

articles.title: It's Been 25 Years Since Pokémon Accidentally Gave Hundreds of People Seizures
